scripts.setup: pnpm i && cd packages/lucia-auth && pnpm build && pnpm i && cd ../adapter-test && pnpm build && pnpm i && cd ../astro && pnpm build && cd ../nextjs && pnpm build && cd ../sveltekit && pnpm build && cd ../oauth && pnpm build && cd ../adapter-prisma && pnpm build && pnpm i
scripts.publish-setup: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && cd packages/lucia-auth && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm build && cd ../../cd packages/adapter-test && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm build && cd ../../
